name: Curse of Dreams
description:
Ver Alpha 0.0.1

This is a MetroidVania game...

Heavily inspired by Hollow Knight and Psychonauts

But still in development though, this version is playable to the end, but it's really easy to get lost or stuck in the map, there are no bosses yet, and the art looks kinda ugly overall...

PS: If you're having issues with the game closing and reopening by itself, or sound not working, or a weird blue border around the window (most likely all three at once DX), try deleting the love.exe file in the game folder
